Introduction: Oh. You just moved in, right? Cool.#$e#Out of all the places you could live, you chose Pelican Town?
Resort_Entering: I liked the boat ride. At one point you couldn't see any land at all..
Resort_Leaving: I'm ready to get back home.
Resort: The beach is nice, but I don't love the crowds.
Resort_Shore: You think Willy would let me lug a jet ski out here?#$b#...Nah.$h
Resort_Wander: ...Now, if I were a tropical frog, where would I hide...$h
Resort_Wander_2: I bet this place looks pretty cool in the rain.
Resort_Towel: It's good to get away from the computer and see the real world sometimes. I forget how nice it can be.$h
Resort_Bar: I usually wear black, but in this heat...
danceRejection: No... There's someone else I want to dance with.
divorced: Why do you keep bothering me? I'm trying to forget about you.$s
dumped_Guys: I don't want to see you for a while.$u
breakUp: ... alright...$s#$b#I guess I'll see you around, then...$s
Mon4: If I just disappeared would it really matter?$s
Tue: I was thinking... people are like stones skipping over the water.#$b#Eventually we're going to sink.
Tue6: I like your new boots!$h^Your hair looks nice today.$h#$e#Do you want to hang out for a while?
Wed: What am I going to do today?#$e#Probably nothing.
Wed2: Fin is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, Luny is nice too, but...$h#$e#Umm.. nevermind.
Wed2_inlaw_Abigail: Fin is probably my only friend in this town, anymore...
Wed6: You and Fin are probably my only friends in this town.$s
Thu: #$1 Sebastian1#I snuck into the caves last night and got a nasty cut from a rock crab. Don't tell anyone, okay?#$e#Hi.#$e#...want something?
Mountain_47_23: I come here for the peace and quiet.
Thu4: Why does everyone like Maru so much? Sure, she's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s
Thu6: Could you picture someone like me living on a farm? It seems ridiculous.$h
Thu8: Could you picture me living on a farm?#$e#It seems ridiculous, but I have been thinking about it lately.
Fri: Uh... I don't really know you.
Fri2: *sigh*... If gas wasn't so expensive I'd ride my motorcycle to the city today.#$e#$q 15/16 Fri_old#So what do you do when you aren't working?#$r 15 0 Fri_bad#More Farming#$r 16 30 Fri_good#Comic books#$r 15 -30 Fri_bad#Shopping#$r 15 -30 Fri_bad#Sports
Fri_old: $p 16#Hey, if you're bored feel free to hang out in my room...$h|You probably prefer the small-town life, huh?
Fri_good: Oh yeah? Well, did you read the new 'Cave Saga X'? I won't spoil it for you, but oh man...$h
Fri_bad: Oh yea? Hmm... Not really my thing, but everyone's different I guess.$u
Sat: What? I didn't hear you... I'm busy thinking about something.#$e#What do you want?
Sat2: You know, I should be doing something productive right now. I just lose focus too fast...$s#$b#Maybe I should drink more coffee?
Sun4: I usually stay inside, but I do go to the beach now and then.#$b#Pretty much only when it's raining, though.#$e#For some reason, staring off into the bleak horizon makes me feel... I dunno. Like it's worthwhile to keep pushing on, I guess.
Fri8: What's new?$h#$e#I'll be at the saloon tonight destroying Fin at pool again.$h
Sun10: I was just thinking about you...$l
Event_game2: Good choice. That works well with my role.
Event_cave1: Not so fast! I want to know what it is.
Event_cave2: Really? It was making a lot of noise!
Event_cave3: It's too dangerous without a sword. But I like your sense of adventure.$h
event_garage3: Don't worry, I'll make sure to show you the ropes before I let you do anything dangerous.$8^There's no need to worry... I'll make sure you're safe.$8
event_city1: Hmm... Not exactly how I'd put it but, yeah.
event_city2: Yea... That's exactly how I feel, too.$l
event_city3: Oh... Well maybe this wasn't the right place to bring you, then. I thought you'd see the beauty in it.$s
event_city4: Ugh... You sound like my Mom.$a#$b#...*sigh*$s#$b#You're right, though. I'm addicted to these things, it's not good.$s
summer_Mon: Everyone is so happy in the sun. I don't get it.
summer_Mon6: Everyone is so happy when it's sunny out...#$e#Different people like different things, I guess.
summer_Tue: I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. I feel more at home.
summer_Wed: What's the point of going outside? I've already seen it all.
summer_Wed8: Why am I grinning? I guess I've been unusually happy lately...$l
summer_Thu: I definitely don't want to go swimming, if that's what you're going to ask.$s#$e#Oh, you just stopped to say hi? Sorry.
summer_Thu10: If you ever wanted to go swimming... I guess I'd do it.$l
summer_Mountain_58_35: #$c .5#The temperature only starts to get comfortable at night.#$e#It always seems to stay a little cooler by the lake.
summer_Fri6: Hey, I'm glad you stopped by.$h#$e#How have you been coping with this heat?
summer_Sat: I hope we're not having mushroom casserole tonight...$s
spring_12: I'm not too big on festivals. Lots of commotion, too much social interaction... More stress than fun, if you ask me.
spring_23: Ugh... Tomorrow is the worst festival of the year by a mile. Just wait and see how stupid I look during the flower dance.
fall_20: Are you looking forward to the Spirit's Eve festival? It's probably my favorite.$h
fall_26: The Spirit's Eve festival is tomorrow. I really hope they have those skeletons on display again this year.$h#$e#I almost feel like they're my friends at this point.
summer_10: Hehe... It might be funny to put something disgusting in the potluck soup tomorrow. Just don't poison anyone.#$e#Why ruin the potluck? Hmm... I guess some people feel liberated when the rigid structures of society break down a little. Maybe I'm weird.
summer_27: Tomorrow we'll all be gathering at the docks to see the migration of the moonlight jellies. I think it starts at ten o'clock.
winter_24: It's the eve of the winter star today. Better make sure you've got an empty stomach for the feast tomorrow.
summer_Sun: I usually only go outside after dark. Does that sound weird to you?
summer_Sun4: Last night, I saw a group of bats flying around near the lake.#$e#I guess maybe they are feeding on the mosquitoes this time of year?
fall_Mon: So... it's the big harvest season, isn't it?
fall_Mon4: You're probably making a lot of money on your farm, huh?#$e#I guess I should get a job soon...$s
fall_Tue: Pumpkin spice this... pumpkin spice that... man, I do get sick of these seasonal fads.
fall_Tue6: Who does Demetrius think he is, telling me what to do? He's not even my real father.$a
fall_Wed: *yawn*... what time is it? I think I slept too much last night.
fall_Wed8: I'm glad you showed up. I was starting to get bored.#$e#Now I feel a lot more energetic, believe it or not.
fall_Thu: My room might be a little less depressing if I had a window...$s
fall_Fri: *yawn*... I was up until 3 reading this new book...#$q 62/63 fall_Fri_old#Do you read, @?#$r 62 -30 Fri_bad#Yep. The classics.#$r 63 30 Fri_good#Only Sci-fi and Fantasy#$r 62 0 Fri_bad#I like a good Romance#$r 63 -30 Fri_bad#No, I don't read books
fall_Fri_old: $p 62#You probably wouldn't like it.$s|I think you'd like it.
fall_Fri_good: Hey, me too. There's nothing like a good fiction to push the boundaries of the imagination.$h
fall_Fri6: I've been reading a book about a farmer. Reminds me a lot of you, actually.$h#$e#Sorry if that creeps you out.$h
fall_Sat: I was *this* close to moping in bed the entire day. Kinda wish I had, now.
fall_Sun: The sun is coming out less and less these days... wonderful.
winter_Mon: I'm enjoying this gloomy weather... although I have to say, it's a little cold.
winter_Mon4: Nothing surprises me anymore... nothing makes me laugh.#$e#Yeah, I know... I'm being a little dramatic.
winter_Tue: Hmm... I don't really have anything to say. I still don't know you very well.
winter_Tue4: Hey...#$b#It's hard to think of new things to talk about, sometimes. Even after you know someone.#$e#...Sorry.
winter_Tue6: I was so close to screaming at Mom for throwing away my old comic collection... But something stopped me.#$e#Hmm... with age comes wisdom.
winter_Tue10: You came here to see me?$l#$e#...$h
winter_Wed4: Hey, don't let me stop you from getting your work done.#$e#If you aren't busy I don't mind if you stick around.$h
winter_Thu: I wonder what's for dinner tonight... *grumble*$s
winter_Thu6: I should learn how to cook. That would be useful.
winter_Fri: It's fun to live so close to the train tracks. It's a reminder that there's a big world out there.
winter_Fri8: When I was younger I'd run out to the railroad whenever I heard a train coming.#$e#Whatever happened to those days...? *sigh*$s
winter_Sat: The frogs aren't very happy in winter.#$e#Poor little guys.$s
winter_Sat6: I like winter but I do feel bad for all the cold animals out there.#$e#I guess they're used to it, though... like me.
winter_Sun: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it.#$e#What's his problem?$u
winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Maru's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.
